are... are you playing the demo and trying to pass it off as the full game?

> 
> are... are you playing the demo and trying to pass it off as the full game?

I said at the beginning of the video that it was only the demo...
oh, OK. you might want to put 'demo' in the title, or people might think that it's the full version
Good point im guna do that now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
